1588720.name: Ion Fury: Aftershock
1588720.description:
Congratulations, Bombshell: you're fired. Your victory drink didn't survive, but Heskel did. Looks like Neo D.C. still needs a Bombshell.


Aftershock is a campaign-sized single-player expansion pack for Ion Fury featuring 15 all-new levels plus an additional 28 levels from the original campaign, rebuilt and remixed by hand, totaling 43 additional levels of new content.


  • 15 all-new campaign levels: Fresh locations, bigger set pieces, and more ways to make a mess.
  • Arrange Mode: All 28 original campaign levels rebuilt by hand with mirrored layouts, revised progression, and reworked item placement and enemy encounters throughout. Aftershock's new weapons and enemies are integrated across the entire Arrange Mode campaign.
  • New weapons, ammo types, and power-ups: More ways to clear rooms, chain explosions, shred cultists, and ruin Heskel's life.
  • Ride a badass weaponized turbo quadcopter: High-speed stunts and vehicular combat that redefine "fight or flight".
  • New enemies and nastier variants of familiar foes: It turns out you aren't the only one loaded up with a new arsenal.
  • Brutal new Angel of Death difficulty: An extra skill level for veteran conquerors who destroyed "Maximum Fury" with ease.
  • Secrets and classic interactivity: More switches, breakables, and hidden detours for explorers who check every corner.
  • All-new in-game score by Jarkko Rotstén: Crank up the music with even more old-school tracker thump per firefight.

Requires the base game Ion Fury.
